activities: WinWeb provides businesses with a range of cloud based applications, software and services available via its website www.winweb.com. WinWeb collects, holds and processes personal data from users and from users' customers in EU/EEA such as name, company name, company number, email address, billing address and credit card information. The personal data collected from the users may be used by WinWeb for the following purposes including but not limited to operating and rendering WinWeb services to users, selling and marketing WinWeb services to users, providing users with support services, complying with the orders and directions of governmental enforcement agencies under applicable laws and regulations, and to exercise our legal rights or defend ourselves against legal claims.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, users and users' client data, electronically and manually processed.
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) or their authorized representatives.
